page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In the area to the west of North Walsham people have to travel quite long distances to work.Hardly anyone works on the land apart from part time work such as fruit picking,hoeing,etc. which is seasonal work-so towns are where the work is.We asked everyone in our school where their parents go to work and we found that 7 work in North Walsham 9 in Aylsham 2 in Bacton 3 in Colby 1 in Norwich 1 in Gunton and 1 in Gt Yarmouth.Some parents are out of work. The number of people unemployed changes because of seasonal work and ups and downs of industry. Tourism is becoming more important as other areas of jobs are uncetain and many firms have to lay off people.
